entry.def: Your classmates are students who are in the same class as you at school or college.

means.word_mean: 1. an acquaintance that you go to school with

auth_sentence.content: Her classmate Femi says porn can worry boys too.
auth_sentence.res_content: Her classmate Femi says porn can worry boys too.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Her classmate Femi says porn can worry boys too.

stems_affixes.word_buile: class级,阶层+ic……的→很容易知道那个阶层或类别的的→著名的→名著,经典

stems_affixes.value_cn: 古典的, 正统派的, 古典文学的
stems_affixes.word_buile: classic名著,经典+al……的→adj.古典的, 正统派的, 古典文学的
class级,阶层+ic……的→很容易知道那个阶层或类别的的→著名的→名著,经典
classify[v.分类, 分等]+ation行为,过程→classification→分类行为或分类结果→分类, 分级
class班级+mate配偶,助手;对手→n.同学
class等级,种类+ify成为……→v.分类, 分等

Sentence.sentence: By comparing notes with their classmates.
The author is most excited about Inkling's notation system because one canparticipate in discussions with classmates and Facebook friends.
participate in discussions with classmates and Facebook friends.
He entered medical school after only three years as did four or five of his classmates.
From his audience and analysis he learned that only 2 or 3 of his classmates knew much of anything about geology.
He also prepared visual aids, diagramming photo line, so his classmates wouldn't get confused

sentences.en: Most of my classmates accord in that opinion.
sentences.cn: 我们班大多数同学都是那个意见。

jushi.english: The schoolboy was the last to come to class that morning.He saw that his teacher and the other classmates all looked very grave.On this, he felt that something unfortunate had taken place.
jushi.chinese: 那学童是在那天早晨到教室里来的最后一个。他见到老师和同学们的表情都严肃,马上感到不幸的事情已发生。

jushi.english: He turned to his classmates for assistance.
We parted with our classmates at the gate.
jushi.chinese: 我们在门口和同学们分手了。
